Trade/Device Name(s): Alere™ i Influenza A & B Control Swab Kit
Regulation Name(s): Respiratory viral panel multiplex nucleic acid assay
Instrumentation for Clinical Multiplex Test Systems
Specimen Type(s): Nasal swab eluted in viral transport media
Nasopharyngeal swab eluted in viral transport media
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Alere™ i Influenza A & B 2 rapid isothermal NAAT assay and instrument for qualitative detection of influenza A and B viral RNA from direct swabs or VTM.
Indications for Use Summary: Rapid qualitative detection and discrimination of influenza A and B viral RNA in direct nasal/nasopharyngeal swabs or swabs eluted in viral transport media from patients with respiratory infection symptoms, as an aid in differential diagnosis in conjunction with clinical/epidemiological risk factors.
